comments.created_time: February 03, 2023, 03:19:18 PMLast edit: March 05, 2023, 12:43:23 AM by wwzsocki
comments.body: How to participate?download desktop version of Utopia client:https://u.is/en/download.htmlshare in comment your Utopia Public Key or uNS NameI will send DM to provided Public Key using Utopia uMessenger or uMail to verify/confirm, reply and get 5CRP (3$) To check Utopia poker clientplay few hands, come back and write review about Utopia poker client (let's discuss the pros and cons), after successful and approved review I will send uVoucher with 8CRP (5$)PSMobile version doesn't support poker yetmy Utopia Public Key: 8AA5420496ACD8021D9C018693777C70F06FC27C6C3C2592BA1075024E3AC23Dmy uNS - emoneyabc

comments.author: wwzsocki
comments.created_time: February 03, 2023, 03:25:27 PMLast edit: February 16, 2023, 08:25:20 PM by wwzsocki
comments.body: Let's play some hands, I think Utopia client can be great place for us, we can play against each other or set up some Bitcointalk tournaments, if you want to try it and tell few words how you like Utopia poker client and soft, then i am more then happy to welcome you in this campaignThere is not much traffic but I hope if there will be few members willing to try it then we will be able to set up some tables.Utopia poker client uses CRP (native Utopia ecosystem coin) is fully anonymous, no rake, no KYC, so perfect place for crypto enthusiast to play, don't you think?Quote from: Techdev on February 03, 2023, 03:22:10 PMHey Emoney ABC, I'm interested. very happy to hear thatplease download Utopia poker client and share your public key or uNS Name if you have it set up on Utopia, then i will send you DM inside Utopia ecosystem using uMessenger to confirm this is for sure you. Once confirmed i will send you CRP voucher, also in Utopia Umessaenger to test poker client, you will redeem it in Utopia wallet, all is in one client you need to download only once: https://u.is/en/download.htmlPSANN thread about Utopia: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5286191another thread about Utopia ecosystem: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5337799https://utopia-ecosystem.com/poker/index.html[moderator's note: consecutive posts merged]

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: wwzsocki on February 03, 2023, 03:19:18 PMreservedhttps://utopia-ecosystem.com/poker/index.htmlThis link loads a page that says "Play now". When you click the button, the page takes you to the Utopia app download page. So it doesn't matter which link you click. This is one thing. The second. I installed the Android app Utopia, but I don't see any way to play poker. It's just a messenger. So there's no poker room on the Android app?

comments.author: wwzsocki
comments.created_time: February 03, 2023, 06:00:28 PMLast edit: February 06, 2023, 11:12:12 AM by wwzsocki
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on February 03, 2023, 04:38:42 PMhttps://u.is/en/download.htmlThis link loads a page that says "Play now". When you click the button, the page takes you to the Utopia app download page. So it doesn't matter which link you click. This is one thing. Yes this is, one is direct link to download page and second as you say link to Utopia ecosystem website.I am using Utopia on desktop, mobile version is pretty new, was released just some time ago and I also never used it before.I will have to check it myself to let you know if there is also poker client in the app, as for now and for purpose of this review please use desktop version if you can, thank you.This is how Utopia client looks like in windows version, poker is visible right awayEDIT@Xal0lex  there is no poker client in the android mobile app

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on December 08, 2022, 08:48:22 AMAnother thing that caught my attention about the Utopia desktop version is that there are games, there are chess games and also poker, for poker games, I see that we need $CRP to play (for betting purposes), I think that it would be great if in the future there is a Utopia campaign on board Gambling to introduce this game, LOL.It looks like the advice I gave was really heard by the Utopia team even though it was only in the form of a review campaign. I will participate in this campaign.Utopia Public Key: 5BD0119563485D8E06A702DC872506ADAB365C1C766E6DB432754259498F472EA little suggestion, maybe the Utopia team can increase the review reward (purpose of getting more enthusiasm), because it seems that with the current reward, it doesn't make many people want to join.

comments.body: I see that the poker room is completely empty  There are no tables, no tournaments. Nothing. Based on that I don't even know what kind of feedback you expect from your pokerroom users. Can't check anything there at the moment. To start with, you need to attract players there, at least. In order to try out the poker room, you can at least begin by adding tables with virtual chips.Public key: 4E7145F2B636EDDA7FF13D616910306BDBFC4C5A9F1CFB158A89AB938178AD38P.S. I apologize for the off-topic. In the client, I saw the "Mining" tab. That is, I understand that the CRP token can be mined. What do have to do to do this?

comments.author: wwzsocki
comments.created_time: February 06, 2023, 01:51:58 AMLast edit: February 08, 2023, 11:51:13 PM by wwzsocki
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on February 05, 2023, 03:07:18 PM...In the client, I saw the "Mining" tab. That is, I understand that the CRP token can be mined. What do have to do to do this?Yes in early times it was literally so easy to mine Crypton (CRP), in the client there was a mining software and anybody with internet connection could mine some CRP but now together with Utopia ecosystem mining also evolved to be able to secure the network properly and maintain it.Here is how it works now in detail:https://utopia-ecosystem.com/articles/3-1.htmlAnd here last update from utopia team about staking requirements for nodeshttps://news.bitcoin.com/new-staking-requirements-for-utopia-mining-nodes/Quote from: Xal0lex on February 05, 2023, 03:07:18 PMI see that the poker room is completely empty  There are no tables, no tournaments. Nothing. Based on that I don't even know what kind of feedback you expect from your pokerroom users. Can't check anything there at the moment. To start with, you need to attract players there, at least. In order to try out the poker room, you can at least begin by adding tables with virtual chips...exactly this is why I waited a bit to be able to gather few people and send vouchers at the same time because as you have seen there are not many tables active daily, so like this we will have the chance to play each other and test Utopia poker client a bitI will be online for the hall day today and open few tables just after I send vouchers, start approximately at 12CET (will be best time I think?).Quote from: MAAManda on February 04, 2023, 08:50:19 AMA little suggestion, maybe the Utopia team can increase the review reward (purpose of getting more enthusiasm), because it seems that with the current reward, it doesn't make many people want to join.thanks for suggestion, we will see how it will go, hope there will be few members that will be happy with this few $ in return for paying few handsthere will be many small fishes by the tables and if you are truly good poker player you can take all these free CRP from themI am one of these fishes that will be swimming there in few hours, for sure there will ba a lot of $$$ to grab by the tables, especially if more people will join to get some FREE CRP to test out Utopia Poker client!
